capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he asked me about Hagrid's age. And you know what? He's definitely an adult, I'm quite certain of it. I mean, have you seen him? The way he moves, his demeanor... it's all very mature. I'd say he's definitely over 30, maybe even closer to 40. Anyway, I'm pretty sure Hagrid is an adult, and that's a fact.
